title: Communication Help: Language Ability (Usefulness 2)
description: Traveler usefulness 2/10 phrases for the Language Ability subcategory within Communication Help. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.japanese: 彼はフランス語を話す。

cards.japanese: 彼は英語と日本語を話します。
